No one is naive here. The slave owners of America, came from European countries. We know history. Racism is everywhere. Blackface is offensive. In America it's not acceptable. In Germany, however, apparently it is. For, Germans, it apparently, isn't a problem. Is it right, or appropriate? That's for Germany to figure out. We know what it is here, in the US. I'm sure there are people in Germany who find it offensive. The video you shared was filmed where? London. London finds it offensive. Do Americans get to install our values, right or wrong, upon the world? Germany can decide what is offensive to them. For them, it was """"well received"""". I'm not adding a right or wrong value to what they did. That's for them.
